sentences.sContent: At any point in the project where you don't interpose your own judgment, your people are more likely to make a mistake. So what?
sentences.sContent_eng: At any point in the project where you don't interpose your own judgment, your people are more likely to make a mistake. So what?
sentences.sCn: 在项目中任何你没有提出自己看法的地方，你的手下都更容易犯错。

sentences.sContent: What is educational expenses? Why does the government want interpose to teach the market? Of social insurance system what is forming? Why should the government intervene again?
sentences.sContent_eng: What is educational expenses? Why does the government want interpose to teach the market? Of social insurance system what is forming? Why should the government intervene again?
sentences.sCn: 什么是教育支出？政府为什么要干预教育市场？社会保险体系的构成是什么？政府又为何要干预？

synos.tran: 提出（异议等）；使插入；使干涉

remMethod.val: inter + pos(放) + e → 放入中间 → 置于…之间
